item.title: #en @ 1438241533803876361
item.description: This year’s recipient of the prestigious Canadian Open Data Leader of the Year is Richard Pietro. Richard is a long-time leader & advocate of open data serving on several open data organizations, leading webinars & podcasts all towards making data more open and accessible #CODS21

item.title: #en @ 1438183343108014080
item.description:
We are very glad two see two @WomenCopernicus from the #Copernicus Emergency Management Service presenting at the #Copernicus4Health workshop
▶️@lucia_luzietti, head of our #RapidMapping contractor team, presented how #EO🛰️#OpenData can support decision makers in 🩺emergencies https://t.co/GJsXQzMPU4

item.title: #en @ 1438170808581562371
item.description:
“We are starting to measure what matters. And every person matters.”
Incredibly powerful words from Gwen Phillips, Ktunaxa Nation, currently championing the B.C. First Nations’ Data Governance Initiative. Grateful to hear Gwen’s intervention at #CODS21 #OpenData

item.title: #fr @ 1438029826347212803
item.description: Le saviez-vous ? Le K-Bis est en voie de suppression, les données qu'il contient sont en open data, et une API permet de récupérer les informations dans vos SI. Plus d'excuse pour demander aux entreprises des Kbis récents :D #demat #TeamCommandePublique https://t.co/QvIwysJ2PB

item.title: #en @ 1437748388582334464
item.description: How can we improve as a society? From learning from unfortunate disasters and not making the same mistakes again. Open info and #OpenData are important. Less political spin & more clear-cut numbers, checks & lessons needed. #Corona vs. #Election Priorities #Statistics #Floods

item.title: #nl @ 1437740557267349508
item.description: 6/ Voor cijfers scholing heb ik de SOI 5-deling van het CBS (zie dataset, vanaf 2003) gewogen met de cijfers 1 t/m 5, want dit komt redelijk overeen met de waardering van de arbeidsmarkt voor opleiding die wij vonden in Grenzeloze Verzorgingsstaat. https://t.co/a3SLMds8xw

item.title: #nl @ 1437739952876441600
item.description: 5/ Voor cijfers over verdachten is 'jongvolwassenen' geïnterpreteerd als groep 18 tot 25 jaar, zie dataset. Tussendoor is 'aangehouden' per 10 000 door het CBS vervangen door 'geregistreerd' per 10 000 vandaar twee lijnen. Verder gewoon verhouding bepaald. https://t.co/4MViTxd98L

item.title: #en @ 1437731535210307587
item.description: I am excited about open data and civic technology for fiscal transparency. More reason I decided to base my 15k words thesis @SussexUni on the work of @BudgITng @TrackaNG @ptcij @UdemeNG and @ppmonitorNG are doing in Nigeria. Seeing that @BudgITng is 10 gladden my heart.

item.title: #en @ 1437725386180341767
item.description:
📣 New Open Data hub launched, giving a new view on how Glasgow operates as a city.
The hub is a place to access data, to provide tools to enable people to visualise this, & to tell some simple stories around what the data means for the city.
More 👉 https://t.co/VPuJT5iqXk https://t.co/5vKATz62yK

item.title: #fi @ 1437718399145156609
item.description: Tiesitkö, että Suomen postinumeroalueista suurimmat mediaanitulot vuonna 2019 oli @EspooEsbo Westendin asukkailla, 39 145 euroa? item.title: #en @ 1437713260950786051
item.description: Terrible news that Martin Isenburg @LAStools has sadly passed away. A tireless campaigner for the release of government held lidar data as open data and developer of the lastools software that supports lidar processing in @QGIS @planlaufterrain and many other platforms. https://t.co/bjLQdNRdne

item.title: #ja @ 1437712711295533056
item.description:
国土数値情報の鉄道区間データを Snowflake データマーケットプレイスで無料共有する Prepper Open Data Bank に追加しました。
Tableau から接続すれば、市区町村を選択するとそこに含まれる路線や駅を表示する、みたいなことがプレップ不要ですぐできます。
#Prepper #Snowflake https://t.co/uamhpJ69ln

item.description: @Conjabi Komt uit deze tabel: https://t.co/9rRBb4VNFU Cijfers gaan maar terug tot 2003, maar toen al was het aandeel hoogopgeleiden onder NL van 25-35 lager dan onder niet-westers van 25-35 in 2020 (32% resp 42%).
